text: Qiu ni wei women zhiding jinshi he houshi di mei hao shenghuo, women que yi guishun ni.” Ta [an la] shuo:“Zhiyu wo de xingfa, wo yao yong ta chengfa wo suo yiyu zhe, er wo de pu ci ze baoluo wanwu. Wo jiang wei jingwei zhe, wan na tian ke zhe he quexin wo de qishi zhe zhiding [wo de] pu ci [zhu].”
